participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Liam is compassionate and hardworking. He enjoys helping others and has a strong sense of responsibility.
participant_1.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue. i work fulltime in a shipyard. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Sophie is playful and curious, with a love for learning and dancing. She enjoys simple pleasures and has a vibrant spirit.
participant_2.background: i don't care about fashion. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i hate the color orange. i dance on the weekends.

content.text: I am good. How are you?
I'm 29. what is your favourite colour?
I love blue, reminds me of summer time.
